You're seriously asking for donations eztv? 
Sure, you're giving us lots of good TV shows but asking for money for doing something that you don't need money to do since you obviously have everything required, is like walking up to a random person in the street and asking them to give you money for no reason.

@Redstar2613

eztv has been providing countless tv shows for as long as I can remember, more than 99% of the time giving good quality and nice filesize, is extremely quick after the show airs, and he does it with his own time, obviously not getting paid by someone to do so. And with so many shows it isn't a walk in the park. You use his services like many many other people, and it would only take a few people's donations to keep him motivated and rewarding him for all his hard work. Considering this isn't like YouTube where you can be partnered, because piratebay and other sites don't do that, it's the least he can ask for.
